title: Soldier Suicides - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/28/18
itunes:title: Soldier Suicides - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/28/18
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and an open lines caller discuss the recent suicide of the caller's son after returning from a tour of duty in Afghanistan, and if the Department of Veterans Affairs can offer more assistance with soldiers with emotional issues.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
